refnamediv.refpurpose: Generates the Scilab internal code representing an instruction "LHS = RHS"

listitem.para: list of Left Hand Side parameters (list of "M2SCI tlists")
a tlist built with "M2SCI" functions, representing the Right Hand Side member of the instruction.

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: This function create a tlist representing an instruction when using M2SCI. All input parameters values are verified to be compatible with "M2SCI tlists".
